text: Pierre D'Archambeau (April 3, 1927 â€“ June 16, 2014) was a Belgian-born American violin virtuoso and pedagogue. He worked with many noted musicians, including Arturo Toscanini, Pablo Casals, Jacques Thibaud, Nadia Boulanger and Fritz Kreisler. D'Archambeau died on June 16, 2014, in his home in Massachusetts, aged 87.The Violin Channel, obituary ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Belgian musicians Category:American violinists
title: Pierre D'Archambeau
